GoTrucking

APPL
$(MARKETING_VERSION)

We need access to your photo library to allow you to upload and view photos .
Access to Bluetooth is necessary for connecting to external devices and peripherals
To manage time, we need access to your calendar
We need access to your camera to capture photos for delivery and profile.
We require access to your contacts to provide social sharing .
We require access to your location even when the app is in the background to track the driver.
We require access to your location even when the app is in the background to track the driver.
YOUR TEXT
We need your location while the app is in use to provide location while pickups and deliveries.
We need access to your microphone for recording audio and enabling voice commands within the app.
Access to motion data is essential for certain app functionalities like fitness tracking.
We require access to add photos to your library, enabling you to save and share content from the app.
We need access to your photo library to allow you to upload and view photos.
We need access to Siri for voice commands and hands-free interaction with the app.
We require access to speech recognition to transcribe spoken words and enable voice commands within the app.
Your app needs this permission to receive push notifications.
LaunchScreen
Access to your music library is necessary for playing and managing audio content within the app.
